Room.Name: South Beach
Room.ShortDescription: You are between high sand dunes on the south side of Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: You are north of the bay, and looking further north you see the beginning of a high cliff that gets higher as it reaches into the waters to the west. There are a number of both large and small caves on the cliff side, and it looks like they might be interconnected inside. A little bit to the north is a path leading to the top of the cliffs. The waters of the bay lie to the south.
